TextBody:
Hello Ayush,

Thank you for contacting the Endpoint Protector support team.

Please refer to our user manual where you can find details in the user manual https://www.endpointprotector.com/support/pdf/manual/Endpoint_Protector_5_User_Manual_EN.pdf under 14.3. SIEM Integration.
The SIEM can be added to the Epp server over the UI options in "Appliance > SIEM Integration".  Please note the logs are sent in syslog - RFC-5424 format.

I hope this information helps, if you have any follow up questions then please do let us know.


Kind regards
__________________
André Le Roux | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
www.endpointprotector.com


This Email may contain confidential information. Not to be disclosed to third parties without prior written approval.

Subject: Ingest EPP logs to Wazuh SIEM tool    [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0C1Wrl:ref ]

Regards,
*Ayush*
